class.name: DungeonGenerator2D
class.brief_description: Main controller for generating procedural 2D dungeons.
class.description: DungeonGenerator2D orchestrates the complete dungeon generation process by managing room and corridor generation, maintaining a grid-based dungeon layout, and instantiating dungeon elements in the scene. It supports configurable room and corridor generators, caching, and debug output.

method.name: create_corridor
method.description: Creates and instantiates a corridor at the specified grid position. Returns a pointer to the created Dungeon2DCpp corridor instance.

method.name: create_room
method.description: Creates and instantiates a room at the specified grid position. The optional [param direction] parameter can be used for room orientation. Returns a pointer to the created Dungeon2DCpp room instance.

method.name: exists_dungeon_in
method.description: Checks if a dungeon element (room or corridor) exists at the specified grid position. Returns [code]true[/code] if a dungeon element exists at the position.

method.name: get_corridor_collection
method.description: Gets the collection of available corridor scenes.

method.name: get_corridor_generator
method.description: Gets the corridor generator node responsible for connecting rooms.

method.name: get_dungeon_in
method.description: Gets the dungeon element at the specified grid position. Returns a pointer to the Dungeon2DCpp at that position, or [code]null[/code] if none exists.

method.name: get_dungeon_size
method.description: Gets the size of the dungeon grid in cells.

method.name: get_on_ready
method.description: Gets whether the dungeon will generate automatically when the node is ready.

method.name: get_print_in_terminal
method.description: Gets whether debug information is printed to the terminal.

method.name: get_room_collection
method.description: Gets the collection of available room scenes.

method.name: get_room_generator
method.description: Gets the room generator node responsible for placing rooms.

method.name: get_room_size
method.description: Gets the size of individual rooms in pixels or units.

method.name: get_use_cache
method.description: Gets whether cached dungeon data is used.

method.name: is_empty
method.description: Checks if the specified grid position is empty (no room or corridor). Returns [code]true[/code] if the position is empty.

method.name: print_dungeon_in_text
method.description: Prints a text representation of the dungeon grid to the terminal for debugging purposes.

method.name: set_corridor_collection
method.description: Sets the collection of available corridor scenes.

method.name: set_corridor_generator
method.description: Sets the corridor generator node that will be used to connect rooms.

method.name: set_dungeon_size
method.description: Sets the size of the dungeon grid in cells (width and height).

method.name: set_on_ready
method.description: Sets whether to generate the dungeon automatically when [method Node._ready] is called.

method.name: set_print_in_terminal
method.description: Sets whether to print debug information to the terminal during generation.

method.name: set_room_collection
method.description: Sets the collection of available room scenes.

method.name: set_room_generator
method.description: Sets the room generator node that will be used to place rooms.

method.name: set_room_size
method.description: Sets the size of individual rooms in pixels or units.

method.name: set_use_cache
method.description: Sets whether to use cached dungeon data for faster regeneration.
